attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Will the Prime Minister consider the award of the Long Service and Good Conduct Medal in retrospect in consultation with the M.O.D. to servicemen and woman who served 15 years or more in the armed forces in cosideration that the criteria has been reduced currently from 18/21 to 15 years.
This has been supported by service veterans associations and questions have been asked in the House but M.O.D. refuse to negotiate.
